Projects

  • Internship

    • 1. “Implementation of Digital Systems using FPGA”

    ➢ Industry: Defence Electronics Research Laboratory (DLRL), Hyderabad.

    ➢ Duration:​ 2 Months (June 2016 & July 2016)

    ➢ Description: Software and hardware approach to the implementation of digital filters and other digital system algorithms using MATLAB, VHDL and Xilinx FPGAs.

  • Academic Projects

    • 1. “Development of an E-Nose for Low Concentration Gas Classification”

    ➢ Duration: 4 Months (August 2016 to December 2016)

    ➢ Description: Developed an experimental E-Nose setup which can elevate the concentration level of gases, so that the sensor array can detect the available gases even at lower concentrations than the threshold concentrations.

    2. “Micro-controller based Artificial Neural Network Implementation for Intelligent Flushing and Deodorizing System”

    ➢ Duration: 4 Months (January 2017 to May 2017)

    ➢ Description: Developed an Intelligent Flushing and Deodorizing System using the E-Nose setup and a PIC micro-controller based Artificial Neural Network (ANN). ANN is used to differentiate toilet gas with the deodorizer.

  • Self & Mini Projects

    • 1. Face Counter using MATLAB.

    2. Face Recognition using MATLAB.

    3. Chat client and server using Python.

    4. Lossless Image Compression using MATLAB.

    5. Implementation of Huffmann Coding, Arithmetic Coding, Shannon Coding, LZ-77, LZ-78, LZW Coding in MATLAB (without using inbuilt functions) and JAVA.

    6. 2D-DFT, 2D-DCT, 2D-KLT, 2D-Haar Transform of Images using MATLAB.

    7. Hardware Implementation of 220v rectifier and DC-DC converter using Silicon Controlled Rectifier.

    8. Line Follower, Wall Follower, GSM and Bluetooth controlled robots using Atmega Micro-controller.

    9. Hardware Implementation of Amplitude Modulation/Demodulation and Frequency Modulation/ Demodulation Circuits for message transmission.

    10. Hardware Implementation of ASK and FSK Modulation/Demodulation Circuits.
